TestFrame.Name: CombTest
TestFrame.Comment: Test fro combination of many FrameBlocks

FrameBlock.Name: Des_MAC_Address
FrameBlock.FrameText: --set Destination MAC Address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0062 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0063 + 12 h01 --mode read=0, write=1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0064 + 12 0E --Reg address2 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0065 + 12 00 --Reg address1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0066 + 12 40 --Reg address0 LSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0067 + 12 00 --Data1 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0068 + 12 00 --Data0 LSB&#013&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0121 00 LASTBYTE&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0122&#013--set Destination MAC Address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0124 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0125 + 12 h01 --mode read=0, write=1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0126 + 12 0E --Reg address2 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0127 + 12 00 --Reg address1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0128 + 12 42 --Reg address0 LSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0129 + 12 00 --Data1 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0130 + 12 00 --Data0 LSB&#013&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0183 00 LASTBYTE&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0184&#013

FrameBlock.Name: smpSync_on
FrameBlock.FrameText: --turn smpSync on&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 h01 --mode read=0, write=1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address2 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 48 --Reg address0 LSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0005 + 12 00 --Data1 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0006 + 12 01 --Data0 LSB&#013&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0059 00 LASTBYTE&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0060&#013

FrameBlock.Name: Set_DUT_VT
FrameBlock.FrameText: --set DUT as VT&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 h01 --mode read=0, write=1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address2 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 00 --Reg address0 LSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0005 + 12 00 --Data1 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0006 + 12 01 --Data0 LSB&#013&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0059 00 LASTBYTE&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0060&#013

FrameBlock.Name: Compatibility670_on
FrameBlock.FrameText: --supress merging SV&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 h01 --mode read=0, write=1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address2 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 07 --Reg address0 LSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0005 + 12 00 --Data1 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0006 + 12 01 --Data0 LSB&#013&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0059 00 LASTBYTE&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0060&#013

FrameBlock.Name: Set_VLAN
FrameBlock.FrameText: --set VLAN&#0130007PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 h01 --mode read=0, write=1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address2 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address1&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 40 --Reg address0 LSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0005 + 12 00 --Data1 MSB&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0006 + 12 00 --Data0 LSB&#013&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATALENGTH 60&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATARAW FALSE&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000&#013ETH PORTX SENDNROFFRAMES 1&#013&#013ETH PORTX SEND START&#013WAIT FOR ms 10&#013ETH PORTX SEND STOP&#013WAIT FOR ms 1&#013&#013
